title: Spy Fiction PS2
description:
<a href="http://www.gametab.com/images/ss/ps2/2927/box-l.jpg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.gametab.com/images/ss/ps2/2927/box-l.jpg</a>


In Spy Fiction, players assume the roles of SEA Phantom Strike members Bishop and Sheila to unravel a mysterious terrorist plot threatening the world with biotech weaponry. Spy Fiction is heavy with spy gadgets and weapons and supposedly introduces new elements to stealth; including an optical camouflage suit and the ability to disguise yourself as any character in the game. In a unique twist, players can control the completely interactive cutscenes using the in-game engine, and follow the various mission briefings to make the next areas more or less difficult.
